title: Amazon Fire TV Cube gets direct audio streaming for hearing aids
content:
Accessibility in tech is a big deal and so whenever a big name puts in an awesome new feature it’s worth talking about. The Amazon Fire TV Cube (2nd Gen) is becoming the first media streamer of its type to support audio streaming directly to hearing aids. Initially, the feature will be exclusive to Starkey’s

The post Amazon Fire TV Cube gets direct audio streaming for hearing aids appeared first on XDA.
description: Amazon's Fire TV Cube and Starkey hearing aids are going to work together to deliver wireless audio using a new system called ASHA.
